Tailwind CSS

Tailwind CSS 是一个强大的工具，用于快速构建现代网页界面，包括移动端样式。

scss-best-practices-to-keep-in-mind https://aming.xyz/information/8-scss-best-practices-to-keep-in-mind/ Mon, 13 May 2024 10:39:40 +0800 https://aming.xyz/information/8-scss-best-practices-to-keep-in-mind/ SCSS 样式 1. 移动端优先 做响应式项目的时候，一般会先写 PC 版本的样式，但这会使移动端样式的书写变得特别痛苦。因此，我们应该先进行移动端样式的书写，在 ps必备的快捷键大全（超详细） - 知乎 https://aming.xyz/information/ps%E5%BF%85%E5%A4%87%E7%9A%84%E5%BF%AB%E6%8D%B7%E9%94%AE%E5%A4%A7%E5%85%A8%E8%B6%85%E8%AF%A6%E7%BB%86-%E7%9F%A5%E4%B9%8E/ Fri, 15 Mar 2024 07:21:14 +0800 https://aming.xyz/information/ps%E5%BF%85%E5%A4%87%E7%9A%84%E5%BF%AB%E6%8D%B7%E9%94%AE%E5%A4%A7%E5%85%A8%E8%B6%85%E8%AF%A6%E7%BB%86-%E7%9F%A5%E4%B9%8E/ mac 版 PS 将 Ctrl 替换为 CMD 即可 一、文件 新建CTRL+N 打开CTRL+O 打开为ALT+CTRL+O 关闭CTRL+W 保存CTRL+S 另存为CTRL+SH mezodawesome-indie Resources for independent developers to make money https://aming.xyz/information/24-3-7mezodawesome-indie-resources-for-independent-developers-to-make-money/ Thu, 07 Mar 2024 09:36:13 +0800 https://aming.xyz/information/24-3-7mezodawesome-indie-resources-for-independent-developers-to-make-money/ Awesome Indie 令人敬畏的独立 Resources to help independent developers make money. 帮助独立开发者赚钱的资源。 Making money from your own code has never been easier, but it’s still hard.
